scenes.name: Main Hall
scenes.summary: a warm, modestly sized castle hall
desc: You stand in the ancient, central hall of Caranae Keep, one of the oldest castles in all of Dostrie. The hearth in the center is by no means the
largest in the region, but it is the most well known. On the long walls hang several banners of the House Garraves.

scenes.name: West Wing
desc: You are in a carpeted hallway with well-worn masonry walls. On the west side of the hallway you can see the courtyard through glass windows.

scenes.name: East Wing
desc: You are in a carpeted hallway with well-worn masonry walls. On the west side of the hallway you can see the courtyard through glass windows.

scenes.name: Courtyard
desc: The courtyard at Caranae Keep is without a doubt its centerpiece. Surrounding you are hedges that climb the walls of the keep and give way to
banners of ivy leaves and moss laden with pink and white flowers. A small dirt stone path leads visitors past the fountain in the center as they
traverse. The aroma of the herbs and flowers growing in the garden plots fill your body with warmth and ease.

scenes.name: Meeting Room
desc: This small room holds a dark wooden table with golden trim. The top of the table has been carved and painted with a gold wreath.
On the back wall you see a map of Dostrie marked the heraldry of long dead houses.

scenes.name: Temple
scenes.summary: a slightly smoky room with benches
desc: You enter the small worship room inside the keep. A few benches have been arranged for viewing of the altar, currently holding
a few incense burners giving the room a pleasant and calming smell. Above the altar you see a stone carving of Charais, the
mother goddess.

scenes.name: Kitchen
desc: You enter the kitchen and immediately are met by cooks and servants buzzing around with purpose. You can smell the pragvan roast
slowly cooking in the oven. How long has it been since you've last had a meal that wasn't dried or stale? The kitchen staff steal
glances at you, hoping you will get the picture and leave them be.

scenes.name: Armory
desc: You are in the guards' armory. Racks of swords, halberds, and shields line the walls, and various pieces of armor sit on shelves
and in chests.

scenes.name: Barracks
desc: The guard barracks at Caranae is likely one of the most luxurious, mainly for the fact that the guards have full access to the
bathhouse and kitchen and all the other facilities of the keep. In the bunks you see guards sleeping or conversing with each
other, all relieved to be here.

scenes.name: Library
desc: As you gaze upon the tall bookshelves surrounding you, the smell of old parchment and bound leather makes its way into your nose
and makes you wish you could read.

scenes.name: Front Courtyard
desc: You stand before the doors to the ancient castle at Caranae. Armored guards patrol the walls and grounds, staring at everything that comes through
the front gates. Messengers and other petitioners stand before the large doors of the main hall demanding entrance, and are vetted by a steward with
tired, dead eyes.

scenes.name: Castle Smithy
scenes.summary: a shop with a shield emblem hanging above its entrance
desc: Caranae has two blacksmiths. The one in the city proper is more general purpose, providing common household goods and fixtures as well as simple
defensive weaponry for travellers. Here, however, %blacksmith% and his apprentices provide only the best weapons and armor to the city watch and
the Garraves' House Guard.

scenes.name: Castle Stables
desc: These are the royal stables, where the steeds of the high court as well as any guests of the court are housed while they are staying in the keep.
The wonderful smell of horse waste greets your nostrils as you take in the surroundings, and it reminds you that no matter how noble the steed,
their shit still stinks.

scenes.name: Front Gate
scenes.summary: inside the gates at the keep
desc: As you pass under the portcullis, the two guards to either side of you look you up and down, assessing you for any threats. You
have a decent feeling that there are more than those two watching you.

scenes.name: Storage Area
desc: Nestled in the northeastern corner of the front yard is a holding area for supply deliveries to be taken to the pantry or other
places in the castle. You seem to be here between deliveries, as aside from a few empty barrels and broken boxes, nothing is here.

scenes.name: Training Ground
scenes.summary: a fenced in ground with dummies and targets
desc: The guards at Caranae try to keep their skills honed, living up to their reputation as an elite unit. The guards themselves duel
with full armor and sharp blades, and you can guess by the red stained dirt that some have met their end here by training.

scenes.name: Guards' Alley'
scenes.summary: a side alley to the barracks
desc: This dark alley is a quick way for guards to get from the barracks and armory to the front yard of the castle, avoiding the
sometimes lively main hall.

scenes.name: Northwest stairs
desc: You walk past a spiral staircase that takes you between the floors of the castle. The stairs are narrow and somewhat treacherous
but only in contrast to the comparatively broad stairs on the south side.

scenes.name: Northeast Stairs
desc: You walk past a spiral staircase that takes you between the floors of the castle. The stairs are narrow and somewhat treacherous
but only in contrast to the comparatively broad stairs on the south side.

scenes.name: Southwest Stairs
desc: You enter an atrium with a modestly sized staircase spiraling up one of the main towers. Between each floor is a small landing
with a portrait and candle, providing mood and light for the unique journey.

scenes.name: Southeast Stairs
desc: You enter an atrium with a modestly sized staircase spiraling up one of the main towers. Between each floor is a small landing
with a portrait and candle, providing mood and light for the unique journey.

scenes.name: Pantry
desc: Okay its a damn pantry I just tried to run through all of these descriptions in a night and I'm tired. There's food, bread, what
do you expect to be in here, a corpse? Maybe later when I finish this game in 30 more years.

scenes.name: Vault Stairwell
desc: While these stairs seem to be well hidden and unguarded, they seem to be strangely well used.
